content: Our work Satori won the Best Paper Nominee Award from ACM MobiSys 2025 (Top 5 out of all 233 submissions)!
The journal version of ElaSe is accepted by ACM TIOT!
Our survey paper on mmWave-based Human Perception is accepted by Journal of Software!
The journal version of BIFROST is accepted by ACM TOSN!
Our paper MASS on metasurface-assisted Wi-Fi sensing is accepted by Springer WASA 2025!
Our paper on metasurface-assisted Wi-Fi sensing is accepted by Journal of Radars!
Our survey paper on mmWave backscatter is accepted by ACM Computing Survey!
Our paper Satori on analog backscatter is accepted by ACM MobiSys 2025 (Acceptance rate: 18.0%)!
Our paper QuinID on parallel RFID is accepted by ACM MobiCom 2025 (Acceptance rate: 17.1%%)!
The journal version of Trident is accepted by IEEE/ACM ToN!
Our work ZuMa on mmWave real-time sensing is accepted by IEEE TMC!
Our three works mmHRR, mmTAI and mmJaw are accepted by IEEE ICPADS 2024!
Our paper ElaSe on 5G vRAN sensing is accepted by IEEE/ACM IWQoS 2024 (Acceptance rate: 24.8%)!
The journal version of mmHawkeve is accepted by ACM TOSN!
Our paper Trident on backscatter network is accepted by IEEE INFOCOM 2024 (Acceptance rate: 19.5%)!
The journal version of AIM is accepted by IEEE TMC!
Our SenSys paper MicNest is invited as Research Highlight article in ACM GetMobile Magazine!
Our paper BIFROST on WiFi localization is accepted by ACM SenSys 2023!
Our paper Meta-Speaker on acoustic sensing is accepted by ACM MobiCom 2023 (Acceptance rate: 24.4%)!
The journal version of MicNest is accepted by IEEE TMC!
Our paper mmHawkeve on mmWave drone trackingis accepted by IEEE SECON 2023 (Acceptance rate: 23.6%)!
Our survey paper on mmWave-based human sensing is accepted by IEEE Communication Survey & Tutorial!
Our work MicNest won the Best Paper Runner-Up Award from ACM SenSys 2022 (Top 2 out of all 209 submissions)!
Our two works MicNest and AIM are accepted by ACM SenSys 2022 (Acceptance rate: 25%)!
